declarations.description:
`a11y-media-player`
an accessible video player

### Styling
`<a11y-media-player>` provides the following basic custom properties
for styling:

#### Basic Styling

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-color` | default text color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-11`
`--a11y-media-bg-color` | default background color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-border-color` | default border color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-3`
`--a11y-media-hover-color` | text color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-hover-bg-color` | background color when hovering | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-accent-color` | accent color | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-9`
`--a11y-media-faded-accent-color` | accent color when faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-disabled-color` | color for disabled items | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-5`
`--a11y-media-transcript-color` | default text color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-7`
`--a11y-media-transcript-bg-color` | default background color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-accent-color` | default accent color of transcript | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-8`
`--a11y-media-transcript-faded-accent-color` | accent color of transcript, faded | `--simple-colors-default-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-color` | text color of transcript cue | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-cue-bg-color` | background color of transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-color` | text color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-bg-color` | background color of active transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-color` | text color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-12`
`--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-bg-color` | background color of focused transcript cue  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-2`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-color` | text color of matched term in transcript search  | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-grey-1`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-bg-color` | background color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-10`
`--a11y-media-transcript-match-border-color` | border color of matched term in transcript search | `--simple-colors-fixed-theme-accent-12`

#### Controls
Custom property | Description | Default 
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-scrollbar-width` | default width of scrollbars | `5px`
`--a11y-media-controls-font-family` | font-family of controls

#### Buttons
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-button-color` | button text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-button-bg-color` | button background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-color` | button text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--a11y-media-button-hover-bg-color` | button background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-button-disabled-color` | button text color when disabled | `--a11y-media-disabled-color`
`--a11y-media-button-toggle-color` | button text color when toggled | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`

#### Sliders
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-range-input-active-color` | slider color when active | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-secondary-color` | slider color for buffering | `--a11y-media-faded-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-color` | slider pin color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-start-color` | slider pin color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-pin-end-color` | slider pin color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-color` | slider knob color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-color` | slider knob color in start position | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-color` | slider knob color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-border-color` | slider knob border color | `--a11y-media-accent-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-start-border-color` | slider knob border color in start position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--simple-range-input-knob-end-border-color` | slider knob border color in end position | `--a11y-media-bg-color`

#### Settings Menu
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-color` | settings menu text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-bg-color` | settings menu background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-color` | settings menu text color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-color`
`--a11y-media-settings-menu-hover-bg-color` | settings menu background color when hovering | `--a11y-media-hover-bg-color`

#### Link Sharing Toast
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-toast-color` | toast text color | `--a11y-media-color`
`--simple-toast-background-color` | toast background color | `--a11y-media-bg-color`
declarations.name: A11yMediaPlayer

members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

members.name: _getTranslation

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: The fallback string to use if translation is not available

members.description: Helper method to safely access translation strings

members.name: anchor
members.description: gets anchors from page and uses their timecodes

members.name: aspect
members.description: the aspect ratio of the media, or if unknown, `16/9`

members.name: audioNoThumb
members.description: returns true if an attribute is set to a value

members.name: captionCues
members.description: gets caption cues that should be visible for custom captions

members.name: captionsTrackKey
members.description: `key` of selected textTrack based on `captionsTrack` and `cc` values

members.name: flexLayout
members.description: determines if player is in flex-layout mode

members.name: fullFlex
members.description: determines if parent is wide enough for full flex-layout mode

members.name: fullscreenButton
members.description: whether or not the fullscreen mode is be disabled

members.name: hasCaptions
members.description: whether the media has any tracks

members.name: loadedTracks
members.description: HTML `audio` or `video` tag where textTracks, if any, can be found

members.name: mediaEnd
members.description: gets media media time if set

members.name: mediaSeekable
members.description: whether media has a seekable time range

members.name: currentTime
members.description: returns the current playback progress or slider position

members.name: shareLink
members.description: gets the link for sharing the video at a specific timecode

members.name: showCustomCaptions
members.description: Show custom CC (for audio and YouTube)?

members.name: stickyMode
members.description: Show custom CC (for audio and YouTube)?

members.name: transcriptCues
members.description: gets transcript cues that should be visible

members.name: transcriptTrackKey
members.description: `key` of selected textTrack based on `transcriptTrack` and `hide-transcript` values

members.name: _captionsChanged
members.description: updates track mode & `__captionsOption` when `captionsTrack` or `cc` changes

members.name: download
members.description: gets download data for the active transcript

members.name: rewind
members.description: seeks media backward at a set increment

members.name: forward
members.description: seeks media forward at a set increment

members.name: selectCaptionByKeyEvent
members.description: Event version for Lit version requirements

members.name: selectCaptionByKey
members.description: selects `captionsTrack` by key and adjusts `cc` accordingly

members.name: selectTranscriptByKeyEvent
members.description: Event version for Lit version requirements

members.name: selectTranscriptByKey
members.description: selects `transcriptTrack` by key and adjusts `hideTranscript` accordingly

members.name: getloadedTracks
members.description: media tag where sources and tracks can be found

members.name: selectTranscript
members.description: selects a specific track as transcript

parameters.name: Toggle

members.name: _handleCloseLink

members.description: handles media metadata when media is loaded

members.description: handles speed slider change thhat sets playback rate

members.name: _handleSliderDragging
members.description: handles duration slider dragging with a mouse

members.name: _handleSliderChanged
members.description: handles duration slider dragging with a mouse

members.description: adds a track's cues to cues array

members.name: _onRemoveTrack
members.description: removes a track's cues from cues array

members.description: on a cue.onenter event scrolls the first active cue to position

members.description: converts time in millesconds to HH:MM:SS

members.name: _getSeconds
members.description: returns time in seconds of a string, such as 00:00:00.0, 0h0m0.0s, or 0hh0mm0.0ss

members.name: autoplay
members.description:
autoplay is an option,
but generally not recommended for a11y

members.name: allowConcurrent
members.description:
Allow this media to play concurrently with other a11y-media-players?
Default is to pause this a11y-media-player when other a11y-media-player starts playing.

members.name: darkTranscript
members.description: Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

members.name: disableInteractive
members.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

members.name: hideTimestamps
members.description: show cue's start and end time

members.default: { ...this.t, audioLabel: "Audio", audioNotSupported: "HTML5 video is not supported.", autoScrollLabel: "Scroll Transcript", captionsLabel: "Closed Captions", captionsOff: "Off", downloadLabel: "Download Transcript", forwardLabel: "Forward", fullscreenLabel: "Fullscreen", copyLinkLabel: "Copy Media Link", closeLinkLabel: "Close", loadingLabel: "Loading...", loopLabel: "Loop Playback", muteLabel: "Mute", nextResultLabel: "Next", pauseLabel: "Pause", playLabel: "Play", prevResultLabel: "Previous", printLabel: "Print Transcript", restartLabel: "Restart", rewindLabel: "Backward", searchLabel: "Search the transcript.", seekSliderLabel: "Seek Slider", settingsLabel: "Settings", speedLabel: "Speed %", transcriptLabel: "Transcript", transcriptLoading: "Loading the transcript(s)...", transcriptOff: "Off", transcriptSkip: "Skip to the transcript.", unmuteLabel: "Unmute", videoLabel: "Video", videoNotSupported: "HTML5 video is not supported.", volumeLabel: "Volume", youTubeLoadingLabel: "Loading...", youTubeStartLoading: "Press play.", youTubeTranscriptLabel: "Transcript will load once media plays.", }

playbackRate
members.description: Playback rate where `1` is normal speed, `0.`5 is half-speed, and `2` is double speed

members.description: the search tool for the transcript

members.name: responsiveSize
members.description: Size of the a11y media element for responsive styling

members.name: transcriptTrack
members.description: the selected track for the transcript

members.name: sticky
members.description: Is the video currently sticky, i.e. it is fixed to the corner when playing but scrolled off screen?

members.name: stickyCorner
members.description:
When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right, or none?
Default is "top-right". "None" disables stickiness.

members.name: volume
members.description: Range is 0 to 100. Default should not be loud enough to overpower screen readers.

members.name: width
members.description: The width of the media player.

members.name: __cues
members.description: array of cues provided to readOnly `get cues`

members.name: __captionsOption
members.description: the index of the selected closed captions

members.name: __loadedTracks
members.description: media captions/transcript tracks array  provided to readOnly `get loadedTracks`

members.name: __transcriptOption
members.description: the index of the selected transcript

members.name: height
members.description: The height of the media player.

members.name: thumbnailSrc
members.description:
Source of optional thumbnail image
Highly recommended for Safari.

members.name: __preloadedDuration
members.description: temporarily duration in seconds until fully loaded

declarations.description:
`a11y-media-button`
a button used in a11y-media-controls and a11y-media-transcript-controls.

declarations.description:
`a11y-media-play-button`
a giant play button that overlays the media in a11y-media-player.
```
Custom styles:
--a11y-play-button-bg-color: overlay background color, default is #000000
--a11y-play-button-focus-bg-color: overlay background color, default is --a11y-play-button-bg-color```
declarations.name: A11yMediaPlayButton

members.name: action
members.description: is button action to send as an event

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: is button action to send as an event

declarations.description:
`a11y-media-state-manager`
A utility that manages the state of multiple a11y-media-players on a single page.
declarations.name: A11yMediaStateManager

members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

members.name: checkConcurrentPlayers
members.description: if a player disallows concurrent players, pauses other players

members.name: _handleIntersect
members.description: handles when active player is out of range and sets stickiness accordingly

members.name: setStickyPlayer
members.description: stops all other players on the page

members.name: players
members.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

members.name: activePlayer
members.description: Manages which player is currently active.

attributes.name: players
attributes.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

attributes.name: activePlayer
attributes.description: Manages which player is currently active.

declarations.description:
`a11y-media-transcript-cue`
a single cue in a11y-media-transcriptas static text or as an button that controls media.

Custom styles:
```--a11y-media-transcript-bg-color: background color of the transcript, default is #ffffff
--a11y-media-transcript-text-color: color of the transcript text, default is #000000```
  
Custom styles for focused cue:
```--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-text: color of the focused cue text, default is --a11y-media-transcript-text-color
--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-bg: background color of the focused cue, default is --a11y-media-transcript-bg-color
--a11y-media-transcript-focused-cue-weight: font-weight of the focused cue, default is bold```
  
Custom styles for active cue:
```--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-text: color of the active cue text, default is --a11y-media-transcript-text-color
--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-bg: background color of the active cue, default is #ccfffd
--a11y-media-transcript-active-cue-weight: font-weight of the active cue, default is normal```
declarations.name: A11yMediaTranscriptCue

members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

declarations.description:
`a11y-media-youtube`
uses YouTubeAPI to create and control an embedded YouTube video.
declarations.name: A11yMediaYoutube

members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

members.name: addPrefetch
members.description: Add a <link rel={preload | preconnect} ...> to the head

members.name: api
members.description: single instance of YouTube iframe script

members.name: init
members.description: initializes singleton to manage a11y-manager-youtube instances

parameters.description: video should loop after playback finishes
parameters.name: whether

members.name: _getSeconds
members.description: returns time in seconds of a string, such as 00:00:00.0, 0h0m0.0s, or 0hh0mm0.0ss

members.name: _handleMediaStateChange
members.description: Fires as YouTube after video src is loaded

members.name: _handleMediaLoaded
members.description: Fires as YouTube video time changes

members.name: _handleTimeupdate
members.description: Fires as YouTube video time changes

members.name: _autoMetadata
members.description: loads metadata by playing a small clip on mute and stopping

members.name: _loadVideo
members.description: loads video (and optionally preloads) from video data object {videoId, optional start timecode, }

members.name: _preloadVideo
members.description:
initializes the youtube player for a given element
See https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters for more information

members.name: t
members.description: youTube's unique identifier for the video

members.name: videoId
members.description: youTube's unique identifier for the video

attributes.name: t
attributes.description: youTube's unique identifier for the video

attributes.description: youTube's unique identifier for the video
